languages.text: Случившееся далее вошло в легенды. Во главе своей свиты Лорд-капитан лично схлестнул{mf|ся|ась} с выползшим из тьмы времен кровожадным ересиархом. Жестокие и унизительные раны нанес{mf||ла} он{mf||а} нечестивому палачу и обратил{mf||а} Крик скверны в бегство.

What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Doomscream was routed.
languages.original_text: Случившееся далее вошло в легенды. Во главе своей свиты Лорд-капитан лично схлестнул{mf|ся|ась} с выползшим из тьмы времен кровожадным ересиархом. Жестокие и унизительные раны нанес{mf||ла} он{mf||а} нечестивому палачу и обратил{mf||а} Крик скверны в бегство.

traits.locale_text: What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Balescream was routed.

What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Balescream was routed.

What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Balescream was routed.

What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Balescream was routed.

What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Doomscream was routed.

What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Doomscream was routed.

languages.text: 接下来发生的事情，简直就像传奇故事一样。舰长大人率领{mf|他|她}的随行人员，向黑暗中爬出来的嗜血怪物发起了挑战。{mf|他|她}狠狠地击中了那名邪恶的刽子手，造成了沉重的一击，灾啸望风而逃。
languages.original_text: What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Doomscream was routed.

traits.locale_text: 接下来发生的事情，简直就像传奇故事一样。舰长大人率领{mf|他|她}的随行人员，向黑暗中爬出来的嗜血怪物发起了挑战。{mf|他|她}狠狠地击中了那名邪恶的刽子手，造成了沉重的一击，灾啸望风而逃。

languages.text: Les événements qui se sont ensuivis appartiennent aujourd'hui à la légende. À la tête de son entourage, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a défié l'hérésiarque sanguinaire tout droit sorti des ténèbres du temps et mis le Fléau Hurlant en déroute en lui infligeant un puissant coup particulièrement humiliant.
languages.original_text: What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Doomscream was routed.

traits.locale_text: Les événements qui se sont ensuivis appartiennent aujourd'hui à la légende. À la tête de son entourage, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a défié l'hérésiarque sanguinaire tout droit sorti des ténèbres du temps et mis le Fléau Hurlant en déroute en lui infligeant un puissant coup particulièrement humiliant.

languages.text: 次に起きたことは伝説となるだろう。自身の従者を率いるロード・キャプテンが、時の闇から這い出てきた血に飢えた異端者に挑んだのだ。{mf|彼|彼女}は邪悪な処刑人に重く致命的な一撃を与え、ドゥームスクリームは敗退した。
languages.original_text: What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Doomscream was routed.

traits.locale_text: 次に起きたことは伝説となるだろう。自身の従者を率いるロード・キャプテンが、時の闇から這い出てきた血に飢えた異端者に挑んだのだ。{mf|彼|彼女}は邪悪な処刑人に重く致命的な一撃を与え、ドゥームスクリームは敗退した。

languages.text: Lo que sucedió a continuación fue digno de la leyenda. A la cabeza de su séquito, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán desafió al heresiarca salido de la antigüedad. Asestó al vil verdugo un golpe humillante y devastador, haciendo que Doomscream se retirara.
languages.original_text: What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Doomscream was routed.

traits.locale_text: Lo que sucedió a continuación fue digno de la leyenda. A la cabeza de su séquito, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán desafió al heresiarca salido de la antigüedad. Asestó al vil verdugo un golpe humillante y devastador, haciendo retroceder a Balescream.

languages.text: Was als nächstes geschah, sollte zur Legende werden. An der Spitze seines Gefolges forderte der Lord Captain den blutrünstigen Häresiarchen heraus, der aus der Dunkelheit der Zeit hervorgekrochen war. Der Lord Captain fügte dem bösen Henker einen schweren, demütigenden Schlag zu, und Unheilsschrei wurde in die Flucht getrieben.
languages.original_text: What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Doomscream was routed.

traits.locale_text: Was als nächstes geschah, sollte zur Legende werden. An der Spitze seines Gefolges forderte der Lord Captain den blutrünstigen Häresiarchen heraus, der aus der Dunkelheit der Zeit hervorgekrochen war. Der Lord Captain fügte dem bösen Henker einen schweren, demütigenden Schlag zu, und Unheilsschrei wurde in die Flucht getrieben.

languages.text: Sonrasında yaşananlar ise efsanelere konu olacaktı. Maiyetine önderlik eden Lord Kaptan; zamanın karanlığından çıkıp gelen, kana susamış kâfirbaşına meydan okudu. Hür Tacir'in habis cellada ölümcül bir darbe indirmesiyle Belanarası alt edildi.
languages.original_text: What happened next would become legend. The Lord Captain at the head of {mf|his|her} retinue challenged the bloodlusting heresiarch that had crawled out of the darkness of time. {mf|He|She} dealt the wicked executioner a heavy and mortifying blow, and thus Doomscream was routed.
